info.title: Toggl Plan
info.description: Plan, collaborate, and get projects done with Toggl Plan

get.description: Returns the profile information of the logged in user.

put.description: Updates the profile of the logged in user.

post.description: Creates a member that has not yet been linked with an existing user.

put.summary: Update member not yet linked with existing user
put.description: Updates a member that has not yet been linked with an existing user.

get.description: Fetches the list of members belonging to a workspace.
Gets a member belonging to a workspace by ID.

put.description: Updates a member belonging to a workspace by ID.

delete.description: Removes a member from a workspace by ID.

get.description: Fetches a list of tasks belonging to a workspace.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only tasks after this date will be returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Only tasks before this date will be returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Filters tasks by users. Only available when filter is set to timeline.

parameters.name: tasks
parameters.description: Filters tasks by a list of ids.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filters tasks by a list of tags.

post.description: Adds a new task to a workspace.

delete.description: Removes a task from a workspace by ID.

put.description: Updates a task from a workspace by ID.

get.description: Fetches a list of milestones belonging to a workspace.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only tasks after this date will be returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Only tasks before this date will be returned. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

post.description: Adds a new milestone to a workspace.

holiday.description: Is the milestone a holiday or not.

get.description: Gets a milestone from a workspace by ID.

delete.description: Removes a milestone from a workspace by ID.

put.description: Updates a milestone from a workspace by ID.

get.description: Fetches a list of projects belonging to a workspace.

post.description: Adds a new project to a workspace.

get.description: Gets a project from a workspace by ID.

delete.description: Removes a milestone from a workspace by ID.

put.description: Updates a milestone from a workspace by ID.

get.description: Fetches a list of groups belonging to a workspace.

post.description: Adds a new group to a workspace.

get.description: Gets a group from a workspace by ID.

put.description: Updates a group from a workspace by ID.

delete.description: Removes a group from a workspace by ID.

post.summary: Add a new user to group
post.description: Adds a new group membership to a workspace.

user_id.description: ID of the user that should be added to the group.

delete.description: Removes a group membership from a workspace by ID.

color_id.description: The color id of the logged in user

created_at.description: The logged in user is created at.

email.description: Email of the logged in user.

email_verified_at.description: The logged in user's email has been verified at.

has_picture.description: The logged in user has a picture.

id.description: The id of the logged in user.

initials.description: Initials of the logged in user.

legal_consent_pending.description: The logged in user has a pending legal consent.

manager.description: The manager of the logged in user.

name.description: Name of the logged in user.

picture_url.description: Picture url of the logged in user.

workspaces.description: Workspaces of the logged in user.

User_Profile_Preferences.description: Preferences of the logged in user.

hide_weekends.description: Hide weekends setting of the logged in user.

highlight_done_tasks.description: Highlight done tasks setting of the logged in user.

onboarding_emails.description: Onboarding emails setting of the logged in user.

pin_me_on_top.description: Pin me on top setting of the logged in user.

selected_account_id.description: Selected account id of the logged in user.

selected_group_id.description: Selected group id of the logged in user.

selected_project_id.description: Selected project id of the logged in user.

start_of_week.description: Start of week setting of the logged in user.

task_notifications.description: Task notifications setting of the logged in user.

timezone.description: Timezone setting of the logged in user.

vision_impaired.description: Vision impaired setting of the logged in user.

vision_impaired_big_font.description: Vision impaired big font setting of the logged in user.

vision_impaired_borders.description: Vision impaired borders setting of the logged in user.

vision_impaired_contrast_text.description: Vision impaired contrast text setting of the logged in user.

vision_impaired_light_colors.description: Vision impaired light colors setting of the logged in user.
